name: Customer already paid the down payment (DP), waiting the Seller confirmation
Seller accept the transaction, waiting the Seller to buy the products
The products already bought by Seller, waiting to be fully paid by Customer
Customer already paid the full payment (FP), waiting the Seller to send the products
The product is being delivered by expedition service, waiting the product to be delivered to Customer
The product has arrived, waiting for Customer's confirmation
The products already received by Customer
Seller reject the transaction, transaction/order cancelled
Seller exceeded the confirmation time limit, refund will be made to the customer
Seller exceeded pre order time limit, refund will be made to the customer
Customer exceeded payment time limit, the DP will be forwarded to the seller
Seller exceeded sending time limit, refund will be made to the customer
